mapper.select: SELECT a.feed_id AS feedId, a.contents, a.location, a.created_at AS createdAt , b.user_id AS writerUserId , if(b.nick_name IS NULL, b.uid, b.nick_name) as writerNm , b.pic as writerPic , IF(c.feed_id IS NULL, 0, 1) as isLike FROM feed a JOIN user b ON a.writer_user_id = b.user_id LEFT JOIN feed_like c ON a.feed_id = c.feed_id AND c.user_id = #{signedUserId} ORDER BY a.feed_id desc LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{size}
